# Ajouter un mixnode 

Modifier le fichier (nodes.json)[https://github.com/notrustverify/nymfrench-bot/blob/main/data/nodes.json]

Exemple:
```json
"mixnodes": [
  {
    "idkey": "APxUbCmGp4K9qDzvwVADJFNu8S3JV1AJBw7q6bS5KN9E",
    "user": ["","cgi_bin"],
    "name": "nym.notrustverify.ch - ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡­Zurich"
  },
```
